insert into menu (name,parent_id,url,orders,sys_id,bz,del_flag,create_by,create_date,update_by,update_date,is_function_menu,menu_icon) value (#{name},#{parentId},#{url},#{orders},#{sysId},#{bz},#{delFlag},#{createBy},new Date(),#{updateBy},new Date(),#{isFunctionMenu},#{menuIcon});
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, parent_id=#{parentId}, url=#{url}, orders=#{orders}, sys_id=#{sysId}, bz=#{bz}, del_flag=#{delFlag}, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_date=#{updateDate}, is_function_menu=#{isFunctionMenu}, menu_icon=#{menuIcon} where id=#{id}
